name: Nivan Ferreira
content: Nivan Ferreira Nivan Ferreira Professor Adjunto (Assistant Professor) Centro de Informatica Universidade Federal de Pernambuco E-mail: nivan@cin.ufpe.br CV Lattes Platform Google Scholar, ORCID About I'm a professor working in the Centro de Informatica at the Universidade Federal de Pernambuco. I am part of the CIn.AI research group. I finished my Ph.D. NYU-Polytechnic School of Engineering under the supervision of Claudio Silva. My thesis on visual analytics techniques for exploration of spatiotemporal data can be found here. I also have been a visiting professor at UniversitÃ© Paris-Saclay (2022) working with the Aviz Group and Postdoctoral scholar with the HDC Group at the University of Arizona (2015). My research focuses on information visualization and visual analytics. I'm also very interested on machine learning and applied mathematics. News 10-Nov-2023 --- Our paper Visual Analytics for Profiling Land Use Changes has received an Honorable Mention Award at SIBGRAPI 2023. 03-Oct-2023 --- Our paper Visual Exploration of Big Spatio-Temporal Urban Data: A Study of New York City Taxi Trips has received the Test of Time Award at VIS 2023. 03-Oct-2023 --- Our paper The Urban Toolkit: A Grammar-based Framework for Urban Visual Analytics has been accepted at VIS 2023. 03-Oct-2023 --- Our paper MoReVis: A Visual Summary for Spatiotemporal Moving Regions published at IEEE TVCG has been invited for presentation at VIS 2023. 03-Oct-2023 --- Our paper A Comparison of Spatiotemporal Visualizations for 3D Urban Analytics has been accepted at VIS 2022. Research Interests My research focuses on information visualization and visual analytics. I'm also very interested on machine learning and applied mathematics. Check out my Google Scholar profile.
